sentences.cn: 使人昏昏欲睡的星期天下午

sentences.en: Far off , I could hear the wich and a locust's somnolent buzz, otherwise silence.
sentences.cn: 我只能听到远处一只小黄鸟在啁啾啁啾地歌唱,还有一只蝉在发出催眠的叫声, 不然就真是万籁俱寂了.

sentences.en: He lay quiet, somnolent after the day’s exertions.
sentences.cn: 他静静地躺着，劳累了一天之后感到十分困倦。

sentences.en: The noise of the stream had a pleasantly somnolent effect.
sentences.cn: 小河潺潺的流水声有宜人的催眠效果。

sentences.en: The noise of the stream have a pleasantly somnolent effect.
sentences.cn: 小河潺潺的流水声有宜人的催眠效果.

sentences.en: The sedative makes people very somnolent.
sentences.cn: 这种镇静剂会让人瞌睡。

sentences.en: The sound had a somnolent effect.

words.tran_cn: 催眠的；使爱睡的；想睡的

trans.tran_cn: 瞌睡的，困的，昏昏欲睡的，使人瞌睡的
